name: Abandoned Underground
description:
As a cute slime, fight other slimes with your spinning blades and modifiable skills. 

The game is still in a very early development stage. But there is a free demo for you!

The content of this demo includes :
  • 4 types of enemies;
  • 3 skills, 3 skill modifies and 3 player enhances;
  • A non-random level;
The content of the upcoming demo includes :
  • Random level;
  • 2 ~ 4 types of enemies;
  • 3 ~ 6 skill modifies;
  • 4 global modifies;
Controls: KeyboardControllerMoveW A S DLeft-StickSkillQ E Shift SpaceX B Y A ButtonSkill modify menuTabSelectGame menuEsc Start
